author: Douglas Ankrah
description: Douglas' original recipe called for raisin infused boubon and I'd recommend you make this drink that way if time permits.
name: Great Mughal Martini

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE raisins in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
